backend/main.mo: Actor storing groups, stages, and round‑robin configs with functions to add groups, add stages, and save advancement rules for a round‑robin stage.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature evidence, affected files, and confidence for multiple tournament‑related frontend features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten one‑line summaries describing the purpose of various frontend tournament files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining light/dark color tokens and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Selects and renders the active tournament page based on current view from the Zustand store and includes global toasts.
frontend/src/components/AdvancementConfi: Dialog allowing configuration of per‑stage winner and runner‑up advancement destinations with validation and state persistence.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper adding container, gradient background, and footer attribution around page content.
frontend/src/components/KnockoutPairingE: Editor for automatic or manual assignment of qualified teams into the first knockout‑round fixtures.
frontend/src/components/MatchDateTimeEdi: Small input component for editing a match’s date and time, updating store state on change.
frontend/src/components/RoundRobinGroupT: UI component for editing round-robin group names, team names, and team positions with inline inputs and store updates.
frontend/src/components/Stage2GroupAssig: Displays a preview of how teams advance between round‑robin stages based on configured advancement rules.
Utility to export a stage’s group and team data to a downloadable JSON file.
frontend/src/features/tournament/generat: Generates all round‑robin stages, groups, and matches and determines advancing teams for subsequent rounds.
frontend/src/features/tournament/groupNa: Creates alphabetic group names (A, B, …, AA, AB, …) based on an index.
frontend/src/features/tournament/groupRe: Reorders teams within a group by moving a team to a target position while preserving unique ordering.
frontend/src/features/tournament/knockou: Builds knockout bracket matches using qualified teams, stage configs, and pairing modes.
Defines knockout round name constants and utilities for ordering and validating round names.
frontend/src/features/tournament/matchCo: Computes the number of matches across round‑robin and knockout stages and provides per‑stage breakdowns.
frontend/src/features/tournament/qualifi: Computes which teams qualify for knockout stages and counts qualifiers based on advancement rules and enabled knockout rounds.
frontend/src/features/tournament/roundRo: Generates round‑robin match pairings for a group by producing all unique team matchups.
frontend/src/features/tournament/types.t: Defines core tournament types including teams, groups, stages, advancement rules, knockout settings, and global tournament state.
frontend/src/features/tournament/useTour: Zustand store handling tournament configuration, generation, updates, and knockout match creation with persistence.
frontend/src/features/tournament/validat: Provides validation utilities for team counts, round configs, advancement rules, date/time formats, and advancement label formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context and provider, handling login, stored identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module for future backend query integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styling with CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/FullSchedulePage.tsx: Displays the full tournament schedule, grouping round-robin and knockout matches by stage and round with navigation to groups or knockout view.
frontend/src/pages/KnockoutPage.tsx: Shows knockout bracket stages, validates qualified team counts, groups matches by round, and provides reset and navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/StageSchedulePage.tsx: Lists all round-robin stages with editable group tables and navigation to full schedule, setup, or reset.
frontend/src/pages/TournamentSetupPage.t: Handles tournament setup including team count, round configs, advancement rules, knockout settings, and generation/reset workflows.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing round-robin group naming rules, feature requirements, and current development status.
